subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Galaxy forward Landon Donovan will join Bayern Munich of the German Bundesliga on loan during the M.L.S. off-season. Donovan’s loan began Monday, and he is scheduled to return March 8, two weeks before the Galaxy opens the season against D.C. United.
